html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13252024-12-16ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Declaring that the Reduction of Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Coal-fired Generation of Electricity Regulations Do Not Apply in Saskatchewan, 2025
PrecisORDER DECLARING THAT THE REDUCTION OF CARBON DIOXIDE EMISSIONS FROM COAL-FIRED GENERATION OF ELECTRICITY REGULATIONS DO NOT APPLY IN SASKATCHEWAN (2025) in order to suspend the application of the federal Regulations in Saskatchewan, effective January 1, 2025, or sooner if the underlying equivalency agreement terminates or is terminated.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0269 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: ORDER DECLARING THAT THE REDUCTION OF CARBON DIOXIDE EMISSIONS FROM COAL-FIRED GENERATION OF ELECTRICITY REGULATIONS DO NOT APPLY IN SASKATCHEWAN (2025) in order to suspend the application of the federal Regulations in Saskatchewan, effective January 1, 2025, or sooner if the underlying equivalency agreement terminates or is terminated.
